script:
1). What did you use to do?
I was an accountant. 
I work for a law firm.
I used the subway.
2). How is your new job going?
It went very well.
I leave on Tuesday.
I'm still getting used to it. 
3). Where do you get your suits dry-cleaned?
Twice a month usually.
I clean them in the morning.
At a place on Main Street.
